fadul1.1 <- fadul1.1_raw %>%
  preProcess_crop(region = "exterior",
                  radiusOffset = -30) %>%
  preProcess_crop(region = "interior",
                  radiusOffset = 200) %>%
  preProcess_removeTrend(statistic = "quantile",
                                 tau = .5,
                                 method = "fn") %>%
  preProcess_gaussFilter() %>%
  x3ptools::sample_x3p()

  preProcess_removeTrend(statistic = "quantile",

fadul1.2_processed <- fadul1.2_raw  %>%
  preProcess_crop(region = "exterior",
                  radiusOffset = -30) %>%
  preProcess_crop(region = "interior",
                  radiusOffset = 200) %>%
  preProcess_removeTrend(statistic = "quantile",
                                 tau = .5,
                                 method = "fn") %>%
